divs: Sighting DetailsWas walking into my condo at about 6:50pm. Lights were noticed because they were out of place in the skyline. At first it looked like Multiple helicopters. I then grabbed my video camera and could get a much clearer view. An object with 3 lights on it was seen looking west from fort lauderdale. It had 3 lights that were visible, these lights were not flashing, blinking, stroking or rotating.. 2 pink and one blue in the center. The object moved north after about 20 minutes of being COMPLETELY STILL and then quickly south out of view. About 5 minutes later another different very bright object appeared again to the west in almost the same position, it was a greenish red color. This object fell below the horizon after about 3 minutes. I have about 25 minutes of this on video. I am going to attach video frames of each object.
Summary: 3 light UFO sitting still in sky, another very bright UFO minutes later
trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around November 3rd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
